wiki.content:
If you don't know this track from the show (and if you're using last.fm, you're probably too young to have heard of the show, let alone seen it) -- it's the music to 80's arcade hit Spy Hunter

wiki.summary: If you don't know this track from the show (and if you're using last.fm, you're probably too young to have heard of the show, let alone seen it) -- it's the music to 80's arcade hit Spy Hunter

track.name: Peter Gunn Theme
comments: This version is a beautiful update of the tried and true from the series
There is something about this version that is grabbing my attention. Very subtle and I can not quite put my finger on it?
"Are you the police?" "No ma'am, we're musicians."
We're on a mission from God.
I wish a band would follow me around and play this song when I was up to no good, I need theme music in my life. lol
This in itself is a classic track, though there's something a little sharper about this Blues Brothers Band version.  Love the HORNS !!!
